BP_EquipmentDescriptorBeacon_C.name: Beacon
BP_EquipmentDescriptorBeacon_C.description:
PENDING REMOVAL
This item will (likely) be removed in a future update.

Currently only used as an ingredient in an alternative recipe.

BP_ItemDescriptorPortableMiner_C.name: Portable Miner
BP_ItemDescriptorPortableMiner_C.description: Can be set up on a resource node to automatically extract the resource. Note that it has limited storage space.

Desc_AlienDNACapsule_C.name: Organic Data Capsule
Desc_AlienDNACapsule_C.description:
This data capsule translates organic chemicals into readable alien genetics information.
Used for researching alien organisms.

Desc_AlienProtein_C.name: Alien Protein
Desc_AlienProtein_C.description:
Ground down Alien Remains in a neat little package.
Used for medical purposed and to research alien organisms.

Desc_AluminaSolution_C.name: Alumina Solution
Desc_AluminaSolution_C.description: Dissolved Alumina, extracted from Bauxite. Can be further refined into Aluminum Scrap for Aluminum Ingot production.

Desc_AluminumCasing_C.name: Aluminum Casing
Desc_AluminumCasing_C.description: A versatile container cast from Aluminum Ingots.

Desc_AluminumIngot_C.name: Aluminum Ingot
Desc_AluminumIngot_C.description:
Aluminum Ingots are made from Aluminum Scrap, which is refined from Alumina Solution.
Used to produce specialized aluminum-based parts.

Desc_AluminumPlate_C.name: Alclad Aluminum Sheet
Desc_AluminumPlate_C.description: Thin, lightweight, and highly durable sheets that are mainly used for products that require high heat conduction or a high specific strength.

Desc_AluminumScrap_C.name: Aluminum Scrap
Desc_AluminumScrap_C.description: Aluminum Scrap is pure aluminum refined from Alumina. Can be smelted down to Aluminum Ingots for industrial usage.

Desc_Battery_C.name: Battery
Desc_Battery_C.description: Primarily used as fuel for Drones and Vehicles.

Desc_Biofuel_C.name: Solid Biofuel
Desc_Biofuel_C.description: The most energy-efficient form of solid biomass. Can be used as fuel for the Chainsaw.

Desc_Cable_C.name: Cable
Desc_Cable_C.description:
Used for crafting.
Primarily used to build power lines.

Desc_CartridgeChaos_C.name: Turbo Rifle Ammo
Desc_CartridgeChaos_C.description: Lightweight, compact, and volatile. These rounds provide extreme capacity and fire rates, at the cost of accuracy.

Desc_CartridgeSmartProjectile_C.name: Homing Rifle Ammo
Desc_CartridgeSmartProjectile_C.description:
The bullet guidance system, build into this ammunition, allows it to accurately hit any target within the reticle area.
Especially useful when dealing with agile threats, or for Pioneers who can't be bothered to aim properly.

Desc_CartridgeStandard_C.name: Rifle Ammo
Desc_CartridgeStandard_C.description: Standard issue Rifle ammunition, useful for establishing dominance.

Desc_Cement_C.name: Concrete
Desc_Cement_C.description:
Used for building.
Good for stable foundations.

Desc_CircuitBoardHighSpeed_C.name: AI Limiter
Desc_CircuitBoardHighSpeed_C.description: AI Limiters are super advanced electronics that are used to control AIs and keep them from evolving in malicious ways.

Desc_CircuitBoard_C.name: Circuit Board
Desc_CircuitBoard_C.description: Circuit Boards are advanced electronics that are used in a plethora of different ways.

Desc_Coal_C.name: Coal
Desc_Coal_C.description: Mainly used as fuel for vehicles & coal generators and for steel production.

Desc_ColorCartridge_C.name: Color Cartridge
Desc_ColorCartridge_C.description:
Used for applying Patterns to structures with the Customizer.

(Patterns can be purchased in the AWESOME Shop.)

Desc_CompactedCoal_C.name: Compacted Coal
Desc_CompactedCoal_C.description: A much more efficient alternative for Coal. Used as fuel for vehicles & coal generators.

Desc_ComputerSuper_C.name: Supercomputer
Desc_ComputerSuper_C.description: The supercomputer is the next-gen version of the computer.

Desc_Computer_C.name: Computer
Desc_Computer_C.description: A Computer is a complex logic machine that is used to control advanced behaviour in machines.

Desc_CoolingSystem_C.name: Cooling System
Desc_CoolingSystem_C.description: Used to keep temperatures of advanced parts and buildings from exceeding to inefficient levels.

Desc_CopperDust_C.name: Copper Powder
Desc_CopperDust_C.description:
Ground down Copper Ingots.
The high natural density of Copper, combined with the granularity of the powder, make this part fit for producing Nuclear Pasta in the Particle Accelerator.

Desc_CopperIngot_C.name: Copper Ingot
Desc_CopperIngot_C.description:
Used for crafting.
Crafted into the most basic parts.

Desc_CopperSheet_C.name: Copper Sheet
Desc_CopperSheet_C.description:
Used for crafting.
Primarily used for pipelines due to its high corrosion resistance.

Desc_CrystalOscillator_C.name: Crystal Oscillator
Desc_CrystalOscillator_C.description: A crystal oscillator is an electronic oscillator circuit that uses the mechanical resonance of a vibrating crystal to create an electrical signal with a precise frequency.

Desc_CrystalShard_C.name: Power Shard
Desc_CrystalShard_C.description:
Mucus from the power slugs compressed into a solid crystal-like shard. 
It radiates a strange power.

Desc_Crystal_C.name: Blue Power Slug
Desc_Crystal_C.description: A strange slug radiating a weak strange power.

Desc_Crystal_mk2_C.name: Yellow Power Slug
Desc_Crystal_mk2_C.description: A strange slug radiating a strange power.

Desc_Crystal_mk3_C.name: Purple Power Slug
Desc_Crystal_mk3_C.description: A strange slug radiating a powerful strange power.

Desc_ElectromagneticControlRod_C.name: Electromagnetic Control Rod
Desc_ElectromagneticControlRod_C.description: Control Rods regulate power output via electromagnetism.

Desc_Fabric_C.name: Fabric
Desc_Fabric_C.description:
Used for equipment crafting.
Flexible but durable fabric.

Desc_Filter_C.name: Gas Filter
Desc_Filter_C.description: Used in the Gas Mask to filter out toxics and pollutants from the air.

Desc_FlowerPetals_C.name: Flower Petals
Desc_FlowerPetals_C.description:
Used for crafting.
Colorful native flower petals.

Desc_FluidCanister_C.name: Empty Canister
Desc_FluidCanister_C.description: Used to package fluids for transportation.

Desc_Fuel_C.name: Packaged Fuel
Desc_Fuel_C.description: Fuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for Vehicles or the Jetpack.

Desc_GasTank_C.name: Empty Fluid Tank
Desc_GasTank_C.description: Used to package gases and volatile liquids for transportation.

Desc_GenericBiomass_C.name: Biomass
Desc_GenericBiomass_C.description:
Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass burners and vehicles can use it for power.
Biomass is much more energy-efficient than raw biological matter.

Desc_GoldIngot_C.name: Caterium Ingot
Desc_GoldIngot_C.description: Caterium Ingots are smelted from Caterium Ore. Caterium Ingots are mostly used for advanced electronics.

Desc_GunpowderMK2_C.name: Smokeless Powder
Desc_GunpowderMK2_C.description: An explosive powder that is commonly used to produce modern firearms.

Desc_Gunpowder_C.name: Black Powder
Desc_Gunpowder_C.description: An explosive powder that is commonly used to produce simple explosives.

Desc_HazmatFilter_C.name: Iodine Infused Filter
Desc_HazmatFilter_C.description: Used in the Hazmat Suit to absorb radioactive particles.

Desc_HeavyOilResidue_C.name: Heavy Oil Residue
Desc_HeavyOilResidue_C.description: A by-product of Plastic and Rubber production. Can be further refined into Fuel and Petroleum Coke.

Desc_HighSpeedConnector_C.name: High-Speed Connector
Desc_HighSpeedConnector_C.description: The high-speed connector connects several cables and wires in a very efficient way. Uses a standard pattern so its applications are many and varied.

Desc_HighSpeedWire_C.name: Quickwire
Desc_HighSpeedWire_C.description: Caterium's high conductivity and resistance to corrosion makes it ideal for small, advanced electronics.

Desc_HogParts_C.name: Hog Remains
Desc_HogParts_C.description:
The carapace of the alien Hog creature.
Used for MAM research.

Desc_IronIngot_C.name: Iron Ingot
Desc_IronIngot_C.description:
Used for crafting.
Crafted into the most basic parts.

Desc_IronPlateReinforced_C.name: Reinforced Iron Plate
Desc_IronPlateReinforced_C.description:
Used for crafting.
A sturdier and more durable Iron Plate.

Desc_IronPlate_C.name: Iron Plate
Desc_IronPlate_C.description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

Desc_IronRod_C.name: Iron Rod
Desc_IronRod_C.description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

Desc_IronScrew_C.name: Screw
Desc_IronScrew_C.description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

Desc_Leaves_C.name: Leaves
Desc_Leaves_C.description:
Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use it for power.

Desc_LiquidBiofuel_C.name: Liquid Biofuel
Desc_LiquidBiofuel_C.description: Liquid Biofuel can be used to generate power or packaged to be used as fuel for Vehicles.

Desc_LiquidFuel_C.name: Fuel
Desc_LiquidFuel_C.description: Fuel can be used to generate power or packaged to be used as fuel for Vehicles or the Jetpack.

Desc_LiquidOil_C.name: Crude Oil
Desc_LiquidOil_C.description: Crude Oil is refined into all kinds of Oil-based resources, like Fuel and Plastic.

Desc_LiquidTurboFuel_C.name: Turbofuel
Desc_LiquidTurboFuel_C.description: A more efficient alternative to Fuel. Can be used to generate power or packaged to be used as fuel for Vehicles.

Desc_ModularFrameFused_C.name: Fused Modular Frame
Desc_ModularFrameFused_C.description: A corrosion resistant, nitride hardened, highly robust, yet lightweight modular frame.

Desc_ModularFrame_C.name: Modular Frame
Desc_ModularFrame_C.description:
Used for crafting.
Multi-purpose building block.

Desc_MotorLightweight_C.name: Turbo Motor
Desc_MotorLightweight_C.description: The Turbo Motor is a more complex, and more powerful, version of the regular Motor.

Desc_Motor_C.name: Motor
Desc_Motor_C.description: The Motor creates a mechanical force that is used to move things from machines to vehicles.

Desc_Mycelia_C.name: Mycelia
Desc_Mycelia_C.description:
Used for crafting.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use it for power.

Desc_NitricAcid_C.name: Nitric Acid
Desc_NitricAcid_C.description: Produced by reaction of Nitrogen Gas with Water. Its high corrosiveness and oxidizing properties make it an excellent choice for refinement and fuel production processes.

Desc_NitrogenGas_C.name: Nitrogen Gas
Desc_NitrogenGas_C.description: Nitrogen can be used in a variety of ways, such as metallurgy, cooling, and Nitric Acid production. On Massage-2(AB)b, it can be extracted from underground gas wells.

Desc_NobeliskCluster_C.name: Cluster Nobelisk
Desc_NobeliskCluster_C.description: A Nobelisk that detonates into multiple smaller explosions. Practical when clearing out large areas of vegetation and other inconveniences.

Desc_NobeliskExplosive_C.name: Nobelisk
Desc_NobeliskExplosive_C.description: A simple explosive, useful for clearing boulders, vegetation, and other obstacles.

Desc_NobeliskGas_C.name: Gas Nobelisk
Desc_NobeliskGas_C.description: Instead of a regular explosion, this Nobelisk creates a deadly gas cloud.

Desc_NobeliskNuke_C.name: Nuke Nobelisk
Desc_NobeliskNuke_C.description:
This Nobelisk uses a nuclear fission reaction to generate a massive explosion.

WARNING: Ensure all FICSIT property is clear of the blast zone before detonation.

Desc_NobeliskShockwave_C.name: Pulse Nobelisk
Desc_NobeliskShockwave_C.description: Instead of a regular explosion, this Nobelisk generates a powerful shockwave.

Desc_NonFissibleUranium_C.name: Non-fissile Uranium
Desc_NonFissibleUranium_C.description:
The isotope Uranium-238 is non-fissile, meaning it cannot be used for nuclear fission. It can, however, be conversed into fissile Plutonium in the Particle Accelerator.

Caution: Mildly Radioactive.

Desc_NuclearFuelRod_C.name: Uranium Fuel Rod
Desc_NuclearFuelRod_C.description:
Used as fuel for the Nuclear Power Plant.

Caution: Produces radioactive Uranium Waste when consumed.
Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

Desc_NuclearWaste_C.name: Uranium Waste
Desc_NuclearWaste_C.description:
The by-product of consuming Uranium Fuel Rods in the Nuclear Power Plant.
Non-fissible Uranium can be extracted. Handle with caution.

Caution: HIGHLY Radioactive.

Desc_PlutoniumWaste_C.name: Plutonium Waste
Desc_PlutoniumWaste_C.description:
The by-product of consuming Plutonium Fuel Rods in the Nuclear Power Plant.
Needs to be stored in a safe location. Handle with caution.

Caution: EXTREMELY Radioactive.

Desc_OreBauxite_C.name: Bauxite
Desc_OreBauxite_C.description: Bauxite is used to produce Alumina, which can be further refined into the Aluminum Scrap required to produce Aluminum Ingots.

Desc_OreCopper_C.name: Copper Ore
Desc_OreCopper_C.description:
Used for crafting.
Basic resource mainly used for electricity.

Desc_OreGold_C.name: Caterium Ore
Desc_OreGold_C.description: Caterium Ore is smelted into Caterium Ingots. Caterium Ingots are mostly used for advanced electronics.

Desc_OreIron_C.name: Iron Ore
Desc_OreIron_C.description:
Used for crafting.
The most essential basic resource.

Desc_OreUranium_C.name: Uranium
Desc_OreUranium_C.description:
Uranium is a radioactive element. 
Used to produce Encased Uranium Cells for Uranium Fuel Rods.

Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

Desc_PackagedAlumina_C.name: Packaged Alumina Solution
Desc_PackagedAlumina_C.description: Alumina Solution, packaged for alternative transport.

Desc_PackagedBiofuel_C.name: Packaged Liquid Biofuel
Desc_PackagedBiofuel_C.description: Liquid Biofuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for Vehicles.

Desc_PackagedNitricAcid_C.name: Packaged Nitric Acid
Desc_PackagedNitricAcid_C.description: Nitric Acid, packaged for alternative transport.

Desc_PackagedNitrogenGas_C.name: Packaged Nitrogen Gas
Desc_PackagedNitrogenGas_C.description: Nitrogen Gas, packaged for alternative transport.

Desc_PackagedOilResidue_C.name: Packaged Heavy Oil Residue
Desc_PackagedOilResidue_C.description: Heavy Oil Residue, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for Vehicles.

Desc_PackagedOil_C.name: Packaged Oil
Desc_PackagedOil_C.description: Crude Oil, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for Vehicles.

Desc_PackagedSulfuricAcid_C.name: Packaged Sulfuric Acid
Desc_PackagedSulfuricAcid_C.description: Sulfuric Acid, packaged for alternative transport.

Desc_PetroleumCoke_C.name: Petroleum Coke
Desc_PetroleumCoke_C.description:
Used for crafting.
A carbon-rich material distilled from Heavy Oil Residue. 
Used as a less efficient coal replacement or for aluminum refinement.

Desc_Plastic_C.name: Plastic
Desc_Plastic_C.description: A versatile and easy to manufacture material that can be used for a lot of things.

Desc_PlutoniumCell_C.name: Encased Plutonium Cell
Desc_PlutoniumCell_C.description:
Plutonium Cells are concrete encased Plutonium Pellets.
Used to produce Plutonium Fuel Rods for Nuclear Power production.

Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

Desc_PlutoniumFuelRod_C.name: Plutonium Fuel Rod
Desc_PlutoniumFuelRod_C.description:
Used as fuel for the Nuclear Power Plant.

Caution: Produces radioactive Plutonium Waste when consumed.
Caution: HIGHLY Radioactive.

Desc_PlutoniumPellet_C.name: Plutonium Pellet
Desc_PlutoniumPellet_C.description:
Produced in the Particle Accelerator through conversion of Non-fissile Uranium.
Used to produce Encased Plutonium Cells for Plutonium Fuel Rods.

Power Usage: 250-750 MW (500 MW average).
Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

Desc_PolymerResin_C.name: Polymer Resin
Desc_PolymerResin_C.description:
Used for crafting.
A by-product of oil refinement into fuel. Commonly used to manufacture plastics.

Desc_PressureConversionCube_C.name: Pressure Conversion Cube
Desc_PressureConversionCube_C.description: Converts outgoing force into internal pressure. Required to contain unstable, high-energy matter.

Desc_QuartzCrystal_C.name: Quartz Crystal
Desc_QuartzCrystal_C.description: Derived from Raw Quartz. Used in the production of advanced radar technology and high-quality display screens.

Desc_RawQuartz_C.name: Raw Quartz
Desc_RawQuartz_C.description: Raw Quartz can be processed into Quartz Crystals and Silica, which both offer a variety of applications.

Desc_Rebar_Explosive_C.name: Explosive Rebar
Desc_Rebar_Explosive_C.description: Explodes on impact, dealing heavy damage.

Desc_Rebar_Spreadshot_C.name: Shatter Rebar
Desc_Rebar_Spreadshot_C.description: This rebar fractures when shot, launching deadly debris in a wide spread but with limited range.

Desc_Rebar_Stunshot_C.name: Stun Rebar
Desc_Rebar_Stunshot_C.description:
Electrocutes the target on impact, stunning it for a short time.

Stun duration: 5 seconds

Desc_Rotor_C.name: Rotor
Desc_Rotor_C.description:
Used for crafting.
The moving parts of a motor.

Desc_Rubber_C.name: Rubber
Desc_Rubber_C.description: Rubber is a material that is very flexible and has a lot of friction.

Desc_Silica_C.name: Silica
Desc_Silica_C.description: Derived from Raw Quartz. Commonly used to create glass structures, advanced refinement processes, and alternative production of electronics.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_1_C.name: Smart Plating
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_1_C.description: Project Part #1. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_2_C.name: Versatile Framework
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_2_C.description: Project Part #2. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_3_C.name: Automated Wiring
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_3_C.description: Project Part #3. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_4_C.name: Modular Engine
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_4_C.description: Project Part #4. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_5_C.name: Adaptive Control Unit
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_5_C.description: Project Part #5. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_6_C.name: Magnetic Field Generator
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_6_C.description:
Project Part #7. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

These modular generators use superconducting magnets and vast amounts of electricity to produce an easily expandable and powerful magnetic field.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_7_C.name: Assembly Director System
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_7_C.description:
Project Part #6. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

This extremely fast and precise computing system is specifically designed to direct the Project Assembly: Assembly Phase.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_8_C.name: Thermal Propulsion Rocket
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_8_C.description:
Project Part #8. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Uses extreme heat to produce the high pressure plasma required to get Project Assembly into motion.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_9_C.name: Nuclear Pasta
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_9_C.description:
Project Part #9. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.
Power Usage: 500-1500 MW (1000 MW average).

Nuclear Pasta is extremely dense degenerate matter, formed when extreme pressure forces protons and electrons together into neutrons. It is theorized to exist naturally within the crust of neutron stars.

Desc_SpikedRebar_C.name: Iron Rebar
Desc_SpikedRebar_C.description: A simple iron rebar that can be shot using the Rebar Gun, for self-defense purposes.

Desc_SpitterParts_C.name: Plasma Spitter Remains
Desc_SpitterParts_C.description:
The remains of a plasma spitting alien creature.
Used for MAM research.

Desc_Stator_C.name: Stator
Desc_Stator_C.description:
Used for crafting.
The static parts of a motor.

Desc_SteelIngot_C.name: Steel Ingot
Desc_SteelIngot_C.description: Steel Ingots are made from Iron Ore that's been smelted with Coal. They are made into several parts used in building construction.

Desc_SteelPipe_C.name: Steel Pipe
Desc_SteelPipe_C.description: Steel Pipes are used most often when constructing a little more advanced buildings.

Desc_SteelPlateReinforced_C.name: Encased Industrial Beam
Desc_SteelPlateReinforced_C.description:
Encased Industrial Beams utilizes the compressive strength of concrete and tensile strength of steel simultaneously.
Mostly used as a stable basis for constructing buildings.

Desc_SteelPlate_C.name: Steel Beam
Desc_SteelPlate_C.description: Steel Beams are used most often when constructing a little more advanced buildings.

Desc_StingerParts_C.name: Stinger Remains
Desc_StingerParts_C.description:
The remains of whatever that creepy thing was.
Used for MAM research.

Desc_Stone_C.name: Limestone
Desc_Stone_C.description:
Used for crafting.
Basic resource mainly used for stable foundations.

Desc_Sulfur_C.name: Sulfur
Desc_Sulfur_C.description: Sulfur is primarily used for Black Powder.

Desc_SulfuricAcid_C.name: Sulfuric Acid
Desc_SulfuricAcid_C.description: A mineral acid produced by combining Sulfur and Water in a complex reaction. Primarily used in refinement processes and Battery production.

Desc_TurboFuel_C.name: Packaged Turbofuel
Desc_TurboFuel_C.description: Turbofuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for Vehicles.

Desc_UraniumCell_C.name: Encased Uranium Cell
Desc_UraniumCell_C.description:
Uranium Cells are produced from Uranium Ore. 
Used to produce Uranium Fuel Rods for Nuclear Power production.

Caution: Mildly Radioactive.

Desc_Wire_C.name: Wire
Desc_Wire_C.description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

Desc_Wood_C.name: Wood
Desc_Wood_C.description:
Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use it for power.

Desc_AssemblerMk1_C.name: Assembler
Desc_AssemblerMk1_C.description:
Crafts two parts into another part.

Can be automated by feeding parts into it with a conveyor belt connected to the input. The produced parts can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

Desc_Blender_C.name: Blender
Desc_Blender_C.description:
The Blender is capable of blending fluids and combining them with solid parts in various processes.
Head Lift: 10 meters.
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards).

Contains both Conveyor Belt and Pipe inputs and outputs.

Desc_CeilingLight_C.name: Ceiling Light
Desc_CeilingLight_C.description:
Can be placed on ceilings to light up indoor factory spaces.

Light color and intensity can be modified.
Allows up to two Power Line connections.

Desc_ConstructorMk1_C.name: Constructor
Desc_ConstructorMk1_C.description:
Crafts one part into another part.

Can be automated by feeding parts into it with a conveyor belt connected to the input. The produced parts can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

Desc_DroneStation_C.name: Drone Port
Desc_DroneStation_C.description:
Drone Ports can have one other Port assigned as their transport destination.
Each Drone Port can contain a single Drone, which transports available input back and forth between its home and destination Ports.

The Drone Port interface provides delivery details and allows management of Port connections.

Desc_FloodlightPole_C.name: Flood Light Tower
Desc_FloodlightPole_C.description:
A tall light tower, specifically designed for illuminating large or outdoor spaces.

Light color and intensity can be modified.
Allows up to two Power Line connections.

Desc_FloodlightWall_C.name: Wall Mounted Flood Light
Desc_FloodlightWall_C.description:
Can be attached to Walls and Foundations to illuminate large spaces.

Light color and intensity can be modified.
Allows up to two Power Line connections.

Desc_FoundryMk1_C.name: Foundry
Desc_FoundryMk1_C.description:
Smelts two resources into alloy ingots.

Can be automated by feeding ore into it with a conveyor belt connected to the inputs. The produced ingots can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

Desc_FrackingSmasher_C.name: Resource Well Pressurizer
Desc_FrackingSmasher_C.description:
Can be placed on a Resource Well to activate it by pressurizing the underground resource.
Once activated, Resource Well Extractors can be placed on the surrounding sub-nodes to extract the resource.
Requires Power. Overclocking increases the output potential of the entire Resource Well.

Desc_GeneratorBiomass_C.name: Biomass Burner
Desc_GeneratorBiomass_C.description:
Burns various forms of biomass to generate electricity for the power grid.
Has no input and must therefore be fed biomass manually.

Resource consumption will automatically be lowered to meet power demands.

Desc_GeneratorCoal_C.name: Coal Generator
Desc_GeneratorCoal_C.description:
Burns Coal to boil Water, the produced steam rotates turbines to generate electricity for the power grid.
Has a Conveyor Belt and Pipe input, so both the Coal and Water supply can be automated.

Caution: Always generates at the set clock speed. Shuts down if fuel requirements are not met.

Desc_GeneratorFuel_C.name: Fuel Generator
Desc_GeneratorFuel_C.description:
Consumes Fuel to generate electricity for the power grid.
Has a Pipe input so the Fuel supply can be automated.

Caution: Always generates at the set clock speed. Shuts down if fuel requirements are not met.

Desc_GeneratorGeoThermal_C.name: Geothermal Generator
Desc_GeneratorGeoThermal_C.description:
Has to be built on a Geyser. Generates power.

Caution: Power production fluctuates.

Power Production:
Impure 50-150 MW (100 MW average)
Normal 100-300 MW (200 MW average)
Pure 200-600 MW (400 MW average)

Desc_GeneratorNuclear_C.name: Nuclear Power Plant
Desc_GeneratorNuclear_C.description:
Consumes Nuclear Fuel Rods and Water to produce electricity for the power grid.

Produces Nuclear Waste, which is extracted from the conveyor belt output.

Caution: Always generates at the set clock speed. Shuts down if fuel requirements are not met.

Desc_HadronCollider_C.name: Particle Accelerator
Desc_HadronCollider_C.description:
The FICSIT Particle Accelerator uses electromagnetic fields to propel particles to very high speeds and energies. The specific design allows for a variety of processes, such as matter generation and conversion.

Warning: Power usage is extremely high, unstable, and varies per recipe.

Desc_JumpPadAdjustable_C.name: Jump Pad
Desc_JumpPadAdjustable_C.description:
Used for quick, vertical traversal.
The launch angle can be adjusted while building.
Caution: Be sure to land safely!

Desc_LandingPad_C.name: U-Jelly Landing Pad
Desc_LandingPad_C.description:
Generates a speed dampening jelly.
Guarantees a safe landing.

Desc_ManufacturerMk1_C.name: Manufacturer
Desc_ManufacturerMk1_C.description:
Crafts three or four parts into another part.

Can be automated by feeding parts into it with a conveyor belt connected to the input. The produced parts can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

Desc_MinerMk1_C.name: Miner Mk.1
Desc_MinerMk1_C.description:
Extracts solid resources from the resource node it is built on. 
The normal extraction rate is 60 resources per minute. 
The extraction rate is modified depending on resource node purity. Outputs all extracted resources onto connected conveyor belts.

Desc_MinerMk2_C.name: Miner Mk.2
Desc_MinerMk2_C.description:
Extracts solid resources from the resource node it is built on. 
The normal extraction rate is 120 resources per minute. 
The extraction rate is modified depending on resource node purity. Outputs all extracted resources onto connected conveyor belts.

Desc_MinerMk3_C.name: Miner Mk.3
Desc_MinerMk3_C.description:
Extracts solid resources from the resource node it is built on. 
The normal extraction rate is 240 resources per minute. 
The extraction rate is modified depending on resource node purity. Outputs all extracted resources onto connected conveyor belts.

Desc_OilPump_C.name: Oil Extractor
Desc_OilPump_C.description:
Normal extraction rate: 120m³ oil per minute.
Head Lift: 10 meters.
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards.)

Can be built on an Oil Node to extract Crude Oil. Extraction rates depend on node purity.

Desc_OilRefinery_C.name: Refinery
Desc_OilRefinery_C.description:
Refines fluid and/or solid parts into other parts.
Head Lift: 10 meters.
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards.)

Contains both a Conveyor Belt and Pipe input and output, to allow for the automation of various recipes.

Desc_Packager_C.name: Packager
Desc_Packager_C.description:
Used for the packaging and unpacking of fluids.
Head Lift: 10 meters.
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards.)

Contains both a Conveyor Belt and Pipe input and output, to allow for the automation of various recipes.

Desc_PipeHyperStart_C.name: Hypertube Entrance
Desc_PipeHyperStart_C.description: Used to enter and power a Hypertube.

Desc_PipelinePumpMk2_C.name: Pipeline Pump Mk.2
Desc_PipelinePumpMk2_C.description:
Can be attached to a Pipeline to apply Head Lift.
Maximum Head Lift: 50 meters
(Allows fluids to be transported 50 meters upwards.)

NOTE: Has an in- and output direction.
NOTE: Head Lift does not stack, so space between Pumps is recommended.

Desc_PipelinePump_C.name: Pipeline Pump Mk.1
Desc_PipelinePump_C.description:
Can be attached to a Pipeline to apply Head Lift.
Maximum Head Lift: 20 meters
(Allows fluids to be transported 20 meters upwards.)

NOTE: Has an in- and output direction.
NOTE: Head Lift does not stack, so space between Pumps is recommended.

Desc_RadarTower_C.name: Radar Tower
Desc_RadarTower_C.description:
Reveals an area around itself on the map. The area is gradually revealed over time up to a maximum.
Placing the tower higher up increases the maximum area revealed.

Desc_ResourceSink_C.name: AWESOME Sink
Desc_ResourceSink_C.description:
Got excess resources? Fear not, for FICSIT does not waste! The newly developed AWESOME Sink turns any useful part straight into research data, as fast as you can supply it! 
Participating pioneers will be compensated with Coupons to be spend at the AWESOME Shop.

Desc_SmelterMk1_C.name: Smelter
Desc_SmelterMk1_C.description:
Smelts ore into ingots.

Can be automated by feeding ore into it with a conveyor belt connected to the input. The produced ingots can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

Desc_StreetLight_C.name: Street Light
Desc_StreetLight_C.description:
A small Street Light, perfect for lighting up factory pathways and roads.

Light color and intensity can be modified.
Allows up to two Power Line connections.

Desc_TrainDockingStationLiquid_C.name: Fluid Freight Platform
Desc_TrainDockingStationLiquid_C.description:
Freight Cars that stop at the Freight Platform will be loaded or unloaded by the Freight Platform.
Loading and unloading options can be set inside the building.
Snaps to other Platforms and Stations.
Needs to be connected to a powered Railway to function.

Desc_TrainDockingStation_C.name: Freight Platform
Desc_TrainDockingStation_C.description:
Freight Cars that stop at the Freight Platform will be loaded or unloaded by the Freight Platform.
Loading and unloading options can be set inside the building.
Snaps to other Platforms and Stations.
Needs to be connected to a powered Railway to function.

Desc_TrainStation_C.name: Train Station
Desc_TrainStation_C.description:
Locomotives can be set to drive to and stop at the Train Station.
You can connect power to the train station to power up the trains on the railway as well as transport the power to other stations.

Desc_TruckStation_C.name: Truck Station
Desc_TruckStation_C.description:
Either send or receive resources to vehicles. Has an inventory with 48 slots.
Transfers up to 120 stacks per minute to/from docked vehicle. 
Always refuels vehicles if it has access to a matching fuel type.

Desc_WaterPump_C.name: Water Extractor
Desc_WaterPump_C.description:
Default extraction rate: 120m³ water per minute.
Head Lift: 10 meters.
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards.)

Extracts water from the body of water it is built on.
Note that the water needs to be deep enough and that rivers do not commonly suffice.
